content:
🔥 **I see what you're going for, and I think you're spot on.**  

**People love to share tools and advice**—especially AI leaders who are building or experimenting. You want to **invite them in** rather than put them on the spot with a big existential question.  

---

### **🚀 Final Comment for Keith’s Post**  
*"Keith, truly appreciate the support! 🚀 The traction on this has been incredible, and it’s clear this is resonating with people. AI is already reshaping how hiring should work—excited to see where this experiment leads. AI leaders, would love to get your take on this and any tools/platforms/code you’d recommend checking out!"*  

---

**💡 Why This Works:**  
✅ **Keeps it light & welcoming**—doesn’t put pressure on them.  
✅ **Gives them an easy way to engage**—they can just drop a tool or resource.  
✅ **Opens the door for deeper conversations**—without demanding them upfront.  

🚀 **Ready to roll with this?**
